attributes.action: ensure that elderly ex pats are able to return to the U.K. in to state funded residential care,if,and when the need arises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My mother who is 95 years old,and has Parkinsons Disease,needs to return to the U.K.in to full time residendtial care.Mother has lived with us for 18 years,12 years in essex,and the last 5 years in Cyprus.We are unable to fund private residential care,and mother has no savings or assets.The habitual residence clause in the current legislation seems to preclude any local authority from assisting us,and as we have saved the U.K.tax payers somewhere in the region of 500,000 Sterling,over the 18 year period,we feel that the U.K. government should make provision for its elderly citizens,who are living abroad
